metadata.Title: CVE-2021-44497 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in FIS GT.M through V7.0-000 (related to theYottaDB code base). Using crafted input, can cause the bounds of a for loopto be miscalculated, which leads to a use after free condition a pointer ispushed into previously free memory by the loop.

criterions.comment: fis-gtm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
